short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Returns recommendations based on previous borrowers books' request from the John Rylands Library (University of Manchester)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recommendations are made using the SALT recommender API which works with over ten years of circulation data from the University of Manchesterâ€™s John Rylands Library.

Go to the  John Rylands Library Catalogue and click over the extension button to obtain recommendations over the titles you are browsing.
